alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Northern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 01 at 10:41PM EST until February 04 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of a quarter inch or more possible. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Susquehanna and Northern Wayne counties. In New York, Delaware county. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage is possible due to the ice. Travel could be very hazardous at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light mixed precipitation will move into the region Wednesday night into Thursday morning. The main round of snow, sleet, and freezing rain will be Thursday afternoon through Friday morning. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. &&
